referenceObject.reference: Striffler, B. F. & Rembold, K. (2009). Henriksenia labuanica nom. nov., a replacement name for Misumenops nepenthicola Bristowe (1930) and clarification of the current taxonomic status of Misumenops nepenthicola Fage (1928) (Arachnida, Araneae, Thomisidae). In: McPherson, S. (ed.) Pitcher plants of the Old World. Volume two. Redfern Natural History Productions, Poole, Dorset, pp. 1334-1337.
